page.title: 17Children's Pets
page.content: Pets are animals usually kept by people in their homes e.g.Cats,Dogs, Rabbits,Fish & Birds.A few children have a Tortoise,one girl has a hamster and another girl's family has Chickens Some children have more than one pet. Recently we have read in our local Newspaper,Southern Evening Echo,of some local families keeping Reptiles as pets.This is very difficult because an even temperature is needed and has to be maintained. The following list shows the number of children keeping a particular pet:- Dogs 7 ;Cats 6 ;Fish 6; Rabbits 4 Budgies 5 ;Tortoises 1; Ducks 1 ; Hamsters 1 ;Chickens 1. We are all expected to look after our own pets.
